IndoVirtue – LEB/LET Exclusive US/Singapore Dedi and VPS Offer – Up to 50% Discount, $24/year VPS, $49.5/month Dedi

Asia, ddos protection, indovirtue.com, ipv6, kvm, openvz, ssd September 4, 2019 @ 9:00 am, by Frank Williams

IndoVirtue is back with attractive offers on various VPS products. They are offering KVM VPS and OpenVZ based VPS’s. They have Budget options as well as Premium options of both types of plans.

IndoVirtue has been featured on LowEndBox once before, and they’ve received positive reviews from users. You can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They also let us know that they have a 7-day refund period for new clients (not valid if that new customer breaks TOS).
Their accepted payment methods include PayPal and CryptoCurrency.
As always, if you purchase from them, feel free to comment below about your experience!

Here’s what they had to say: 

“We have been providing cPanel website hosting solutions since late 2010 at local city in Bali (Indonesia) for startup projects, companies and young entrepreneurs. Then we continued entering un-managed dedicated servers and VPS market since around May 2013 globally under international commercial domain, before finally were featured on LowEndBox at the end of 2014.

With more than 8 years of experience, we are currently holding strong with many happy customers from all around the world, hosted at our Singapore and USA locations. Please contact us and we will be happy and grateful to answer any questions, custom needs, suggestions and any feedback you may have!”

Here are the offers: 

USA KVM SSD – USKVMSSD-1

  • 1024MB RAM
  • 1x IvyBridge vCPU
  • 20 GB SSD space
  • 1000 GB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • $5/month regular price
  • Coupon: USKVMSSDLEB-B (50% discount, USKVMSSD with 3, 6 and 12 months only)
  • With LEB/LET exclusive coupon, price is $7/quarter or $26.5/year recurring
  • [ORDER]

Budget Singapore KVM SSD – SGKVMPOPSSD-SPECIAL

  • 512MB RAM
  • 1x SandyBridge vCPU
  • 5GB SSD space
  • 1000 GB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • /64 IPv6
  • $30/year regular price
  • Coupon: LEBSGPOPSSD-A (20% recurring discount, all Singapore Budget VPS with 3, 6 and 12 months only)
  • With LEB/LET exclusive coupon, price becomes $6/quarter or $24/year recurring
  • [ORDER]

Budget Singapore OpenVZ SSD VPS – SGOVZPOPSSD-SPECIAL

  • 1024MB RAM
  • 32MB Swap
  • 1x Haswell vCPU
  • 10GB SSD space
  • 1000 GB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • /64 IPv6
  • $30/year regular price
  • Coupon: LEBSGPOPSSD-A (20% recurring discount, all Singapore Budget VPS with 3, 6 and 12 months only)
  • With LEB/LET exclusive coupon, it becomes $6/quarter or $24/year recurring
  • [ORDER]

Premium Singapore KVM SSD – SGSSDKVM-1

  • 512MB RAM
  • 64MB Swap
  • 1x Skylake vCPU
  • 20GB SSD space
  • 500 GB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink, additional DDoS protection available
  • 1x IPv4
  • /64 IPv6
  • $10/month
  • [ORDER]

Premium Singapore OpenVZ – SGOVZSSD-1

  • 1024MB RAM
  • 32MB Swap
  • 1x Skylake vCPU
  • 20GB SSD space
  • 400 GB transfer
  • 1Gbps uplink, additional DDoS protection available
  • 1x IPv4
  • /64 IPv6
  • $7/month
  • [ORDER]
